div.h2: Welcome to Eastbrook High School, home of the Panthers.

div.p: Our mission is to provide a safe and stimulating educational environment for all students. Our vision is to equip all students to achieve academic success and to become productive adults. Thank you for the opportunity to serve you and your children at Eastbrook Community Schools.
